answer.a11y-message: You can now answer the answers of the collection {{group}}. Press enter to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the escape key.
answer.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to go to the first unanswered question, the left- and right-arrow keys to switch between the questions, key 2 to open the user menu, key 0 to go back to the session overview or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
answer.a11y-current-multiple: This is a multiple choice question. Navigate with tab to the question and the answers. Later press the space button to select answers
answer.a11y-current-single: This is a single choice question. Navigate with tab to the question and then use the up and down-arrow keys to select an answer.
answer.a11y-current-text: This is a text question. Navigate with tab to the question and press tab again to go to the answer input.
answer.a11y-already-answered: You have already answered this question. Navigate with tab to the question and get your answer or answers.
answer.a11y-already-answered-single: The possible answers were {{allAnswers}}. You have answered this question with the answer {{answer}}.
answer.a11y-already-answered-multiple: The possible answers were {{allAnswers}}. You have answered this question with the answers {{answers}}.
answer.a11y-already-answered-text: You have answered this question with {{answer}}.
answer.a11y-has-abstained: You abstained on that question. Press the tab key to hear the question again.
answer.a11y-last-content: This was the last question of this collection. Press the key 0 to return to session overview.
answer.a11y-submit: Sends the answer and go to the next one.
answer.a11y-abstain: Abstain on this question and go to the next one.
answer.at-least-one: Please select at least one answer.
answer.questions-locked: No comments have been released yet!

comment-list.a11y-filter-correct: Filters all comments marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-filter-wrong: Filters all comments marked as wrong
comment-list.comment-got-favorited: A comment of yours got favorited!
comment-list.comment-sent-to-moderator: The comment will be reviewed by a moderator.

comment-page.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to create a comment, key 2 to go to the user menu. As soon as several comments are available you can search and filter comments. Press key 3 to search in the comments list, key 4 to sort comments, key 5 to filter comments, key 6 to start or continue the comment stream, key 7 to go to the first comment, key 0 to return to the session overview or press the escape key to repeat this announcement.
comment-page.a11y-message: You are now on the comment page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-comment-answered: Go the the answer of this comment
comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This comment was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This comment was marked as a bonus comment.
comment-page.a11y-text-read: This comment was discussed in full view on the beamer.
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: This comment was marked as not correct.
comment-page.a11y-entered-answer: This comment has been answered with: {{answer}}.
comment-page.comment: The Comment {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{beamer}} {{answer}}
comment-page.mark-not-correct: Marked as correct by the professor
comment-page.mark-not-favorite: Bonus comment: Your professor intends to give a bonus for that comment.
comment-page.mark-not-wrong: Marked as wrong by the professor
comment-page.new-comment: A new comment with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for comments.

feedback.a11y-message: You are now in Live Feedback. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or use the Escape key to call up the announcement later.
feedback.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to find out the status of the current feedback, key 2 to go to the user menu, key 3 to give feedback that the instructor should proceed faster, key 4 to give feedback that you can follow well, key 4 to give feedback that you can't follow so well, key 5 to give feedback that you got hung up, key 0 to return to the session summary or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
feedback.a11y-status: Currently the feedback is {{status}}. {{state0}} percent would like to proceed faster, {{state1}} percent can follow well, {{state2}} can't follow that well, {{state3}} percent have been disconnected.
feedback.a11y-very-satisfied: Indicates you'd like to proceed more quickly.
feedback.a11y-dissatisfied: Indicates you can not follow easily.
feedback.a11y-very-dissatisfied: Indicates that you've been hanged up.

room-page.a11y-room-message: You're in the session now. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to go to the comments overview, key 2 to open the user menu, key 3 to go to the live feedback, key 4 to navigate through the question collections, key 5 to navigate to the statistics, key 0 to go to the back button, or key 9 to repeat this announcement.
room-page.a11y-comments: Opens the page where you can create comments and vote up or down other comments.
room-page.a11y-statistics: Opens the statistics for the question collections.
room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this session there are {{count}} Question collections. Tab between them and press Enter to answer the questions of the collection.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no questions in this session yet.
